body_html:
Problems with PRI... macros not being defined can often be solved by compiling with -D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS=1 -D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS=1 -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1.
(Actually you only need -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1 but if I have to add it, I always add the other two as well.)
body_text:
Problems with PRI... macros not being defined can often be solved by compiling with -D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS=1 -D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS=1 -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1.
(Actually you only need -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1 but if I have to add it, I always add the other two as well.)
body:
Problems with `PRI...` macros not being defined can often be solved by compiling with `-D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS=1 -D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS=1 -D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1`.
(Actually you only need `-D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS=1` but if I have to add it, I always add the other two as well.)
